Actors: Andy Serkis, Karin Konoval, Terry Notary, Richard Ridings

Title: Big Eyes
Actors: Amy Adams, Christoph Waltz, Danny Huston, Krysten Ritter
Plot: A drama about the awakening of the painter Margaret Keane, her phenomenal success in the 1950s, and the subsequent legal difficulties she had with her husband, who claimed credit for her works in the 1960s.
Awards: Won 1 Golden Globe. Another 1 win & 15 nominations.

Actors: Warren Christie, Lloyd Owen, Ryan Robbins, Michael Kopsa
Plot: Decades-old found footage from NASA's abandoned Apollo 18 mission, where two American astronauts were sent on a secret expedition, reveals the reason the U.S. has never returned to the moon.

Title: I, Robot

Actors: Nicolas Cage, Ellen Burstyn, Kate Beahan, Frances Conroy
Plot: A sheriff investigating the disappearance of a young girl from a small island discovers there's a larger mystery to solve among the island's secretive, neo-pagan community.

Plot: In the year 2154, the very wealthy live on a man-made space station while the rest of the population resides on a ruined Earth. A man takes on a mission that could bring equality to the polarized worlds.
